AreonDev Software Development

Developing awesome but useless software...


Start hacking!

We're just some crazy students who simply have too much free time

We develop some cool (sometimes useless) tools for administration purposes or simply for fun!

Our software is entirely open source and available on GitHub!

View On GitHub

Our Projects

CodeGreen

CodeGreen was our first 2D game. It was built upon OpenTK and written in C#. It runs under Linux and Windows. The performance of this game is really bad :( But hey, it was our first project so it's ok :)

View On GitHub

CgStAdv

The name of this project is ehm ... kinda creative :) Well, it's the successor of CodeGreen. Performance is still quite, it's still a 2D game but it turned into a jump 'n run. We had a lot of trouble setting up a working build environment so don't be sad if building fails with approx. 1K erros :D

View On GitHub

FreezingArcher (First Attempt)

This is our first 3D game. It is still based on OpenTK. With this project we introduced ourselves into the world of shaders and cool stuff. We've implemented out first terrain generation system in this project. After a few months we recognized that this code base with OpenTK, GTK-Sharp, etc. is kinda like pain in the ass. So we decided to rewrite FreezingArcher from scratch and build up a game framework rather than a complete game.

View On GitHub

FreezingArcher (Second Attempt)

This is currently our main project. This project is a framework like development environment for 3D game projects. Have a look at the projects website for further information.
